channel.title: Gfx or animation/were to add?
channel.description:
Pi source 317
Ok for the soul splitt effects thing. not the hp. but like the white balls and all that stufff... I alrdy have the gfx i want it to do when u attack another player. But when i added it it does the gfx when you turn soul slpit on. How do i make ti so when you use it on another player it does it. also is it suppose to be animations or gfx's? or is that same thing LOols
